message: Hello Bob! I have a fantastic product I think you'd be interested in.  I'm offering it to you for $180. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand your budget.  I'm willing to come down to $150. This is a great deal for a product of this quality. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $150, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I'm seeing your willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to come down to $140. This is a fair price for both of us.  What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $140, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, we're getting close. I'm willing to come down to $135.  This is my final offer, let's make this deal work.  What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $135, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
